thread.title: Samara Weaving to play female lead in 'The Babysitter'
thread.title_full: Samara Weaving to play female lead in 'The Babysitter' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Samara Weaving to play female lead in 'The Babysitter'
text:
Actress Samara Weaving is in final talks to star as the female lead in New Line studio's "The Babysitter".
READ: Samara Weaving lands lead role in McG's 'Babysitter'
To be directed by Joseph McGinty "McG", the story follows a young boy and his babysitter on a night where things turn bad, said The Hollywood Reporter.
The 23-year-old Australian actress will play the role of babysitter.
Judah Lewis, star of Jean-Marc Vallee's Demolition , is in negotiations to star in the role of the young boy.
McG, 47, will produce the project under his Wonderland Sound & Vision banner.
